Class BatteryChargerControl
This class contains code that is specific to the A/D converter module. This really should be removed to purify the class. A possible way could be to use the plugin features of Qt so that code relevant to the channel type can be separated out and only added in when necessary.

Member main
Add a feature to allow the interface to be selected and tested.
